p.codeblock: virtual int enableLoopbackRecording(bool enabled, const char* deviceName = NULL) = 0;
public abstract int EnableLoopbackRecording(bool enabled, string deviceName = "");
Future<void> enableLoopbackRecording( {required bool enabled, String? deviceName});

section.p: If you enable loopback audio capturing, the output of the sound card is mixed into the audio stream sent to the other end.

ul.li: This method applies to the macOS and Windows platforms only.
macOS 系统默认声卡不支持采集功能，如果你需要使用该功能，请启用一个虚拟声卡，并将 deviceName 设为该虚拟声卡的设备名。 声网推荐你使用声网自研的虚拟声卡 AgoraALD 进行采集。
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable loopback audio capture.
: Enable loopback audio capturing.
: (Default) Disable loopback capturing.
The device name of the virtual sound card. 默认为空，代表使用 AgoraALD 虚拟声卡进行采集。

ul.li: macOS: The device name of the virtual sound card. 默认为空，代表使用 AgoraALD 虚拟声卡进行采集。
Windows: The device name of the sound card. The default is set to null, which means the SDK uses the sound card of your device for loopback audio capture.
